text: Rikki-Tikki-Tavi () is a 1975 Soviet movie directed by Nana Kldiashvili and Aleksandr ZguridiРИККИ-ТИККИ-ТАВИ (1975) and stars Igor Alekseyev, Vera Altayskaya, and Aleksey Batalov. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1975 movies
title: Rikki-Tikki-Tavi (1975 movie)
